casebody.data:
The Florida Midland & Georgia R. R. Co., Appellant, v. Edwin E. Glaskin, Respondent. Decided May 2, 1887. Appeal from judgment dismissing complaint entered upon the report of a referee. Also appeal from order denying plaintiff’s motion to send back the referee’s report for correction, and from order denying plaintiff’s motion to vacate the referee’s report, and directing the referee to insert in the report a direction as to the judgment to be entered thereon. Charles B. Meyer, for appellant.' Ira Shafer, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment and the two orders appealed from should be affirmed, with costs.
